command_group: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing uri
description: Manage a Marketplace Offer listing's URIs.

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing uri add
commands.summary: Add a URI for a marketplace offer listing.
commands.syntax:
az partnercenter marketplace offer listing uri add --display-text
                                                   --offer-id
                                                   --subtype
                                                   --type
                                                   --uri
                                                   [--add]
                                                   [--force-string]
                                                   [--remove]
                                                   [--set]
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing uri add --offer-id MyOfferId --uri https://myuri                     --type PrivacyUri --subtype mySubType --display-text "My Privacy Policy"

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing uri delete
commands.summary: Delete a URI for a marketplace offer listing.
commands.syntax:
az partnercenter marketplace offer listing uri delete --offer-id
                                                      [--display-text]
                                                      [--subtype]
                                                      [--type]
                                                      [--uri]
                                                      [--yes]
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing uri delete --offer-id MyOfferId --uri https://myuri --type PrivacyUri

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing uri list
commands.summary: List the uri for a marketplace offer listing.
commands.syntax: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing uri list --offer-id
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing uri list --offer-id MyOfferId
